meanings.definition: Relating to the point in the orbit of the moon or a satellite at which it is nearest to the earth.
meanings.sent1: The perigeal position of the satellite allows for better communication with Earth.
meanings.sent2: The perigeal distance between the moon and Earth is fascinating to astronomers.
meanings.sent3: The perigeal view of the moon made the astronauts feel closer to home.
meanings.sent4: The perigeal moment of the satellite passing by felt like a celestial embrace.
meanings.sent5: The perigeal proximity of the moon created a sense of awe and wonder.
